title: Foul-mouthed twins go viral with explicit rant on inflation: "Been saying this for the last f*cking three years..."
description:
Everywhere from haircuts, groceries, and just about everything else in between, the elephant in the room remains the same. And that is the impact of inflation under the Biden administration. Or in other words, Bidenomics.

The average American has taken a hit with the constant increase in prices. And if you haven't, you will likely know someone complaining about their empty wallet. That is why two twin brothers from New York have gone viral after posting a series of relatable rants about the rising cost of living.
